price: (89) So turn aside from them and say, "Peace."[1456] But they are going to know.
arabic: فَٱصۡفَحۡ عَنۡهُمۡ وَقُلۡ سَلَٰمٞۚ فَسَوۡفَ يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: [1456]- Meaning safety or security, i.e., "I will not harm you."  This was before permission was granted for armed struggle.

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: fa-iṣ'faḥ ʿanhum waqul salāmun fasawfa yaʿlamūna
